==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/pre-class-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# 课前就绪检查表（\*为必过）

- - 名单/报名/无障碍需求确认
- - 场地/链接/设备/物料/备份方案就绪
- T-7/T-3/T-1 沟通已发送并回执
- 作业/测验/证书规则已告知
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/pre-class-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/classroom-safety-checklist.md ====================
# 线下课堂安全检查表

- 门禁/指示/疏散/医疗
- 房间/座位/音视频/计时器
- 物料/电源/环境与噪音
- 安全告知与应急脚本
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/classroom-safety-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/facilitator-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# 讲师/促动就绪检查表

- 脚本/时间盒/互动设计齐备
- 课堂规则与心理安全
- 记录与回写责任明确
- 事故升级与替补机制
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/facilitator-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/engagement-techniques-checklist.md ====================
# 参与与互动技巧检查表

- 破冰/轮询/分组/角色扮演/项目制
- 学习者差异化支持
- 时间盒与能量管理
- 反馈/提问/复盘节奏
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/engagement-techniques-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/assessment-integrity-checklist.md ====================
# 评估与作业公正性检查表

- 抄袭/代写/监考与声明
- 评分卡与仲裁机制
- 回写与留痕/可申诉渠道
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/assessment-integrity-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/coaching-quality-checklist.md ====================
# 教练质量检查表

- 目标设定与契约(GROW/OSKAR)
- 观察与证据/反馈与练习
- 行动承诺与追踪
- 保密与伦理边界
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/coaching-quality-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/transfer-followup-checklist.md ====================
# 迁移与跟进检查表

- 在岗任务与经理共创
- 观察清单与里程碑
- 强化提醒与激励
- 效果回访与再教练
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/transfer-followup-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-master-checklist.md ====================
# Onboarding Master Checklist

- 背调与资料齐全
- 账号/设备/门禁/邮箱就绪
- Day1/Week1 安排
- 与 Dispatch/Finance/HRIS 对齐
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-master-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-security-compliance.md ====================
# Onboarding Security & Compliance

- NDA/安全与隐私培训签收
- 最小权限/访问矩阵/到期回收
- 设备加密/双因素/水印
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-security-compliance.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-day1-audit.md ====================
# Day 1 Audit

- 报到/身份核验
- 设备登录/系统可用
- 课程启动/导师Kickoff
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-day1-audit.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-week1-integration.md ====================
# Week 1 Integration

- 合规/岗位课程 ≥ 90%
- 影子学习+独立任务
- HRBP/经理期望校准
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/onboarding-week1-integration.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/dispatch-handoff-checklist.md ====================
# Dispatch Handoff

- 档案完整/岗位站点班次齐全
- 证照/培训完成验证
- 现场报到信息送达
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/dispatch-handoff-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/onboarding-kb.md ====================
# Onboarding KB

- Offer→Preboarding→Day1→Week1→试用→转正/派遣
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/onboarding-kb.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/training-catalog.md ====================
# Training Catalog

- 通用/岗位/证照课程与复审
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/training-catalog.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/role-catalog.md ====================
# Role Catalog

- 岗位族→岗位→等级→技能→课程→证照
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/role-catalog.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/access-matrix.md ====================
# Access Matrix

- 系统×角色×权限×审批×到期×证据
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/access-matrix.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-scenarios.md ====================
# Task: simulate-scenarios

- 输入：需求信号（客户/站点/岗位/班次）、供给池（技能/等级/可用性）、约束（工时/加班/证照）、SLA/成本阈值
- 输出：覆盖率、利用率、成本、OT、风险热力图；推荐方案与变更单
- 方法：Baseline/Optimistic/Pessimistic/Surge；蒙特卡洛；线性/整数规划（可选）
- 验收：Coverage ≥ 95% 且 Cost ≤ 预算 或签批例外；生成证据与版本号
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-scenarios.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/build-dashboard.md ====================
# Task: build-dashboard

- 输入：er-kpi-dashboard-tmpl.json + 数据源
- 输出：一页式 KPI JSON 与链接
- 规则：阈值与告警明示
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/build-dashboard.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/workforce-planning-master-checklist.md ====================
# Workforce Planning Master Checklist

- 需求来源与时效确认
- 供给池与证照更新
- 法规与班次约束录入
- 三方案对比与敏感性分析
- 风险与后备/替补预案
- 与 Dispatch/Finance/CE 对齐交付节奏
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/workforce-planning-master-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/demand-signal-quality-checklist.md ====================
# Demand Signal Quality Checklist

- 来源一致性与时间戳
- 粒度与预测区间覆盖
- 异常值与缺失回填
- 客户确认留痕
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/demand-signal-quality-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/capacity-balance-checklist.md ====================
# Capacity Balance Checklist

- Coverage/Utilization 指标达标
- 技能/等级/证照匹配率
- 将培训中与即将到岗纳入预测
- 约束冲突检测
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/capacity-balance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/scheduling-policy-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Scheduling Policy Compliance Checklist

- 最短/最长班次与间隔合规
- 加班审批与上限
- 轮班公平与偏好机制
- 变更通知与留痕
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/scheduling-policy-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/dispatch-capacity-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# Dispatch Capacity Readiness Checklist

- 周覆盖与利用率达到阈值
- 关键岗位合规核验
- 后备与跨站点预案
- 与 CE/Dispatch/Finance 口径一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/dispatch-capacity-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/workforce-kb.md ====================
# Workforce KB

- 概念与口径
- 数据刷新节奏
- 与 HRIS/Dispatch/Finance 的接口
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/workforce-kb.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/validate-sow.md ====================
# Task: validate-sow

- 输入：SOW草案 + 检查清单
- 输出：差异与整改清单
- 规则：合同/价税/SLA/合规一致性
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/validate-sow.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-health.md ====================
# Task: review-health

- 输入：账户健康度指标 + 近期事件
- 输出：健康评分（A/B/C/D）与纠偏建议
- 规则：评分口径固定并可追溯
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-health.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/schedule-cadence.md ====================
# Task: schedule-cadence

- 输入：客户节奏/时区/语言偏好
- 输出：会议/周报/QBR日历与提醒
- 规则：冲突与节假自动规避
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/schedule-cadence.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/client-intake-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta:
  { name: "Client Intake", owner: client-engagement-manager, editors: [sales, legal, pm, sm, po] }
sections:
  - { id: context, title: 业务与目标, fields: [business_goal, scope, exclusions, timeline] }
  - {
      id: roles,
      title: 岗位与画像,
      fields: [role_family, level, skills, language, location, onsite_policy],
    }
  - { id: kpi, title: KPI/SLA, fields: [kpi_list, calc_formulas, acceptance, stopwatch_rules] }
  - {
      id: compliance,
      title: 合规与数据,
      fields: [pii, nda, dp_agreements, cross_border, retention],
    }
  - {
      id: commercial,
      title: 商务与价税,
      fields: [currency, price_model, tax, payment_terms, penalties, incentives],
    }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/client-intake-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/engagement-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Engagement Plan", owner: client-engagement-manager }
sections:
  - { id: objectives, title: 目标与成功标准, fields: [objectives, success_criteria] }
  - { id: delivery, title: 交付节奏, fields: [cadence, milestones, owners] }
  - { id: risks, title: 风险与缓解, fields: [risk_register_ref, mitigations, contingency] }
  - { id: governance, title: 治理与升级, fields: [escalation_matrix_ref, decision_rights] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/engagement-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/stakeholder-map-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Stakeholder Map", owner: client-engagement-manager }
sections:
  - { id: matrix, title: 影响力×支持度矩阵, fields: [sponsors, blockers, neutrals] }
  - { id: raci, title: RACI, fields: [responsible, accountable, consulted, informed] }
  - { id: contact, title: 联系与偏好, fields: [contact_info, language_pref, timezone] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/stakeholder-map-tmpl.yaml ====================

  - { id: escalation, title: 升级矩阵, fields: [severity_levels, response_sla, approvers] }
  - { id: tooling, title: 工具与留痕, fields: [channels, minutes_repo, dashboard_links] }

  - { id: risks, title: 风险与阻塞, fields: [new_risks, blocks, sla_breaches] }
  - { id: actions, title: 行动项, fields: [owner, due, status] }

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/qbr-report-tmpl.md ====================
# QBR（Quarterly Business Review）模板

## 执行摘要

## KPI 趋势与对比（目标/实际/偏差/根因）

## 价值案例（Cost/Quality/Delivery/Experience）

## 风险与应对

## 下季路线图与需求/续约/扩单清单
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/qbr-report-tmpl.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/escalation-matrix-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Escalation Matrix", owner: client-engagement-manager }
levels:
  - { severity: P1, response_sla: "15m", notify: [client-exec, vendor-exec], bridge: yes }
  - { severity: P2, response_sla: "1h", notify: [client-manager, vendor-manager], bridge: yes }
  - { severity: P3, response_sla: "4h", notify: [project-team], bridge: no }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/escalation-matrix-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/client-intake-quality-checklist.md ====================
# Client Intake Quality Checklist

- 业务目标、范围、交付物与禁区清晰
- 角色/级别/技能/语言/地域/驻场要求明确
- KPI/SLA/验收口径与计算公式一致
- 数据与合规：PII/保密/越境/委托处理同意
- 币种/价税/结算/里程碑与处罚/奖励条款明确
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/client-intake-quality-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/sow-alignment-checklist.md ====================
# SOW Alignment Checklist

- SOW 与提案/报价/合同条款一致
- KPI/服务边界/例外情形/停表规则对齐
- 变更控制路径、升级矩阵、违约与赔偿条款确认
- 安全/合规/审计证据与留痕要求落地
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/sow-alignment-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/comms-cadence-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Comms Cadence & Compliance Checklist

- 周会/周报、月度复盘、QBR节奏定义
- 升级矩阵：事件等级→响应/恢复SLA→责任人
- 双语/跨时区沟通规则、工具与留痕
- 会议纪要与行动项SLA管理
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/comms-cadence-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/interview-collab-fairness-checklist.md ====================
# Interview Collaboration & Fairness Checklist

- 岗位画像与面试题库对齐
- 去偏与公平性提示、评分量表
- 记录/证据与反馈时限
- 客户面试官培训/参与协议
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/interview-collab-fairness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/client-dispatch-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# Client Dispatch Readiness Checklist

- 客户侧入场证/账号/安规/工具准备
- 地点/时区/差旅/住宿/费用政策确认
- 驻场安全/保密/数据处理规范
- 到岗SLA与试派反馈闭环
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/client-dispatch-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/billing-and-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Billing & Compliance Checklist

- 价税/币种/付款条件/里程碑账期
- 工时/加班/差旅报销口径与证据
- 发票抬头/税号/系统登记
- 争议处理与贷项/补开规则
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/billing-and-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/qbr-prep-checklist.md ====================
# QBR Preparation Checklist

- KPI趋势/异常/根因与改进
- 成功案例与价值影响（Cost/Quality/Delivery/Experience）
- 风险台账与下一季计划
- 续约/扩单/新机会列表
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/qbr-prep-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/account-health-checklist.md ====================
# Account Health Checklist

- SLA与阻塞解除时长
- 关系网络覆盖度（赞助人/批评者/中立者）
- 冲突/争议状态与解决进度
- 满意度/NPS与续约意向
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/account-health-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/change-control-checklist.md ====================
# Change Control Checklist

- 变更类型/影响面/成本与排期评估
- 风险与回退方案
- 审批链与留痕
- 合同附件/价税更新
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/change-control-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/risk-escalation-checklist.md ====================
# Risk Escalation Checklist

- 分级与触发阈值
- RACI与响应SLA
- 通知路径与对外口径
- 事后RCA与预防改进
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/risk-escalation-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/client-engagement-kb.md ====================
# Client Engagement KB

- 参与生命周期：Intake→SOW→KPI→交付→变更→QBR→续约
- 文档到执行：模板→清单→任务→证据→仪表盘
- 法务/合规要点：NDA/PII/越境/委托处理/证据留存
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/client-engagement-kb.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/kpi-dictionary.md ====================
# KPI Dictionary

- Case Resolution、SLA Response、Recurrence、Mediation Success、eNPS/ER满意度、Leave & Accommodation Compliance 等指标的口径与公式
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/kpi-dictionary.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/cadence-calendar.md ====================
# Cadence Calendar（默认）

- 周会/周报：每周固定时间；跨时区采用轮值时段
- 月度复盘：每月第1周；关注KPI/阻塞/行动项
- QBR：每季度；覆盖价值故事/续约/扩单
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/cadence-calendar.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/interview-rubrics.md ====================
# Interview Rubrics

- 行为面试/技术面试评分量表（1-5）
- 去偏提示与合法性边界
- 反馈SLA与证据留存
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/interview-rubrics.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/stakeholder-raci.md ====================
# Stakeholder RACI（示例）

- 客户：Sponsor/Approver/Users/Procurement/Legal/ITSec
- 我方：Sales/Legal/PM/SM/CE Manager/Finance/Delivery
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/stakeholder-raci.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/pricing-sow-glossary.md ====================
# Pricing & SOW Glossary

- T&M/Fixed/Retainer、价税/发票、里程碑、罚则/奖励 等关键术语
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/pricing-sow-glossary.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-what-if.md ====================
# Task: simulate-what-if

- 输入：what-if-scenario-tmpl.yaml + 约束
- 输出：覆盖率/加班/到岗SLA/成本影响
- 规则：显式假设、敏感度分析
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-what-if.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/optimize-roster.md ====================
# Task: optimize-roster

- 输入：rules + availability + coverage_target
- 输出：改良排班（含冲突/合规校验）
- 规则：优先覆盖关键时段/岗位，压低加班与风险
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/optimize-roster.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/reconcile-timesheet.md ====================
# Task: reconcile-timesheet

- 输入：timesheets + 客户停表/例外规则
- 输出：对账差异清单与开票建议
- 规则：证据链接/审批留痕
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/reconcile-timesheet.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/roster-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta:
  {
    name: "Roster Plan",
    owner: staffing-dispatch-coordinator,
    editors: [workforce-planner, sm, pm],
  }
sections:
  - { id: scope, title: 范围, fields: [period, sites, roles, coverage_target] }
  - { id: rules, title: 排班规则, fields: [shift_patterns, rest_rules, max_hours, holiday_rules] }
  - { id: schedule, title: 轮班表, fields: [week_no, person_id, role, shift, site, backup] }
  - { id: audit, title: 合规与审批, fields: [violations, approvals, notes] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/roster-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dispatch-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta:
  {
    name: "Dispatch Plan",
    owner: staffing-dispatch-coordinator,
    editors: [client-engagement-manager, onboarding-manager],
  }
sections:
  - { id: match, title: 匹配度, fields: [skills_fit, level_fit, language_fit, clearance] }
  - {
      id: plan,
      title: 派遣安排,
      fields: [client, location, start_date, end_date, availability, sla],
    }
  - { id: logistics, title: 差旅/住宿, fields: [travel_policy, bookings, cost_estimate, approvals] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dispatch-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/shift-swap-request-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Shift Swap Request", owner: staffing-dispatch-coordinator }
fields: [requestor, original_shift, reason, impact, substitute, approvals, evidence]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/shift-swap-request-tmpl.yaml ====================

meta: { name: "Coverage Matrix", owner: staffing-dispatch-coordinator }

metrics: [required_headcount, assigned_headcount, coverage_rate, overtime_risk]

  - { id: breaches, title: 违约清单, fields: [time, site, person_id, reason, action] }
  - { id: improvements, title: 改进措施, fields: [owner, due, status] }

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/incident-report-tmpl.md ====================

## 时间线（含证据）

## 影响评估（SLA/成本/安全）

## 升级记录与外部沟通

## 根因分析（RCA）与预防
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/incident-report-tmpl.md ====================

## 指标快照（覆盖/到岗/加班）
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/daily-ops-brief-tmpl.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/what-if-scenario-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "What-If Scenario", owner: staffing-dispatch-coordinator }
assumptions:
  - { id: demand_spike, title: 需求+15%, params: [site:A, shift:N] }
  - { id: staff_dropout, title: 缺勤+3%, params: [role:senior, reason:flu] }
  - { id: holiday_overlap, title: 假日叠加, params: [region:JP, week:W52] }
outputs: [coverage_impact, overtime_impact, arrival_sla_risk, cost_delta]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/what-if-scenario-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/staffing-dispatch-master-checklist.md ====================
# Staffing & Dispatch Master Checklist

- 需求与供给口径一致（角色×级别×地点×班别×技能）
- 假日/请假/培训/面试冲突清除
- 客户SLA/覆盖率/到岗窗口与现场规则锁定
- 入场证件/工具/工位/账号/安规完成度
- 排班合规：最大连班/最小休息/夜班限制
- 差旅策略与成本上限确认
- 风险台账、备援人选与交接计划
- 审批链完成与留痕
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/staffing-dispatch-master-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/roster-policy-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Roster Policy Compliance Checklist

- 轮班规则：shift_patterns/rest_rules/max_hours/holiday_rules 校验
- 交叉培训/轮岗覆盖关键岗位
- 加班阈值/审批与替班流程清晰
- 班次变更的通知与留痕
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/roster-policy-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/availability-verification-checklist.md ====================
# Availability Verification Checklist

- 可用性窗口与地域限制（签证/远程策略）
- 上一派遣/项目冲突
- 设备/网络/时区可达性
- 个人限制（健康/家庭）与保密承诺
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/availability-verification-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/client-site-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# Client Site Readiness Checklist

- 入场证/门禁/工位与工具
- 客户侧账号/系统/安规培训
- 驻场安全/隐私与数据处理规范
- 现场应急联系人与升级矩阵
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/client-site-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/shift-swap-control-checklist.md ====================
# Shift Swap Control Checklist

- 换班原因/证据/影响分析
- 替班人选技能与资质对等
- 客户SLA/关键时段影响评估
- 审批链与通知闭环
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/shift-swap-control-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/travel-cost-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Travel Cost Compliance Checklist

- 差旅等级/路线/住宿上限
- 费用单据/币种/税率/发票口径
- 里程碑或值班津贴规则
- 异常与超标审批
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/travel-cost-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/incident-escalation-checklist.md ====================
# Incident Escalation Checklist

- 迟到/缺勤/安全事件分级与SLA
- 升级路径与外部沟通口径
- 证据留存与时间线
- 事后RCA与预防改进
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/incident-escalation-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/timesheet-and-billing-checklist.md ====================
# Timesheet & Billing Checklist

- 工时填报频率/截止时间
- 加班/夜班/差旅补贴口径一致
- 客户对账/停表规则
- 发票信息/抬头/税号/账期与争议处理
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/timesheet-and-billing-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/dispatch-kb.md ====================
# Dispatch KB

- 生命周期：供给盘点→排班→派遣→到岗→工时→结算→复盘
- 文档到执行：模板→清单→任务→证据→仪表盘
- 关键协同：Workforce Planner（容量）/ Onboarding（就绪）/ CE Manager（客户）/ Finance（结算）
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/dispatch-kb.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/shift-rules.md ====================
# Shift Rules

- 最小休息间隔/最大连班天数/夜班限制/强制休息日（按地域维护）
- 交叉培训与轮岗策略/关键岗位备援
- 假日/加班/津贴口径
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/shift-rules.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/travel-policy.md ====================
# Travel Policy

- 交通/住宿/餐补政策与上限、预订流程与审批
- 费用凭证/币种/税率/发票规则
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/travel-policy.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/holidays-calendar.md ====================
# Holidays Calendar

- 国家/地区/客户现场假日差异
- 周期：周/双周；跨时区对齐策略
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/holidays-calendar.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/sites-and-badges.md ====================
# Sites & Badges

- 现场与门禁信息；入场证/访客证/安全培训到期日
- 账号/工具/座位/网络要求清单
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/sites-and-badges.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/validate-contract.md ====================
# Task: validate-contract

- 输入：SOW/合同草案 + clause-consistency-checklist
- 输出：差异清单与修订建议
- 规则：条款口径一致、合规边界清晰
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/validate-contract.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/run-dpia.md ====================
# Task: run-dpia

- 输入：dpia-tmpl.yaml + 数据/系统背景
- 输出：风险/缓解/残余风险 + 批准记录
- 规则：触发条件/降级标准明示
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/run-dpia.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/map-data-flow.md ====================
# Task: map-data-flow

- 输入：系统/流程/第三方清单
- 输出：数据流图/ROPA/传输路径
- 规则：目的/依据/留存/证据齐备
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/map-data-flow.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-vendor.md ====================
# Task: review-vendor

- 输入：subcontractor-due-diligence-tmpl.yaml + 证据
- 输出：评级（A/B/C/D）与整改项
- 规则：隐私/安规/财务/交付综合评分
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-vendor.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/manage-incident.md ====================
# Task: manage-incident

- 输入：事件报告与证据
- 输出：分级/通报/取证/RCA/改进行动
- 规则：时限与法律/合同差异化通报
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/manage-incident.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/collect-evidence.md ====================
# Task: collect-evidence

- 输入：control清单 + 证据来源
- 输出：审计证据台账
- 规则：可抽样/可追溯/可复盘
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/collect-evidence.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/sow-legal-review-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta:
  {
    name: "SOW Legal Review",
    owner: compliance-legal,
    editors: [client-engagement-manager, pm, finance],
  }
sections:
  - { id: scope, title: 服务范围与边界, fields: [deliverables, exclusions, stopwatch_rules] }
  - { id: kpi, title: KPI/SLA, fields: [kpi_list, calc_formulas, acceptance, remedies] }
  - { id: commercial, title: 商务与价税, fields: [currency, price_model, tax, payment_terms] }
  - { id: legal, title: 法务要点, fields: [liability_cap, indemnity, ip, confidentiality] }
  - { id: compliance, title: 合规要点, fields: [privacy, security, audit_rights, evidence] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/sow-legal-review-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dpa-tmpl.yaml ====================

sections:
  - { id: parties, title: 当事方与角色, fields: [controller, processor, joint_control] }
  - { id: processing, title: 目的/范围/期限, fields: [purpose, categories, duration, locations] }
  - { id: security, title: 安全措施, fields: [technical_measures, org_measures] }
  - { id: subprocessors, title: 分包与再委托, fields: [approval, list, notice_period] }
  - { id: rights, title: 数据主体请求, fields: [process, sla, evidence] }
  - { id: exit, title: 返还/删除, fields: [return, deletion, certification] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dpa-tmpl.yaml ====================

  - { id: risk, title: 风险与控制, fields: [risks, mitigations, residual_risk] }

  - detect: [triage, severity, notify_internal]
  - contain: [isolate, preserve_evidence]
  - eradicate: [fix, validate]
  - recover: [restore, monitor]
  - notify: [regulator, data_subjects, clients]
  - review: [rca, improvements]

fields: [deliverable, clause, metric, target, evidence, signoff]

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/compliance-legal-master-checklist.md ====================
# Compliance & Legal Master Checklist

- 合同与SOW：范围/价税/KPI/停表/罚则/奖励一致性
- 数据与隐私：目的限制/最小化/留存/同意/主体权利
- 跨境传输：评估/机制/条款/持续监控
- 委托处理/再委托：DPA/附属协议/审计权/退场
- 供应商：尽调/安规/隐私条款/证据
- 培训：强制课程/测评/记录
- 事件响应：分级/SLA/通报/证据/复盘
- 审计：证据清单/抽样/整改
- 账单条款：工时/加班/差旅/发票口径一致
- 风险台账：识别/分级/缓解/跟踪
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/compliance-legal-master-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/clause-consistency-checklist.md ====================
# Clause Consistency Checklist

- 定义与术语统一
- 服务范围与边界/例外/停表规则一致
- KPI计算口径清晰（停表/例外）
- 价税/币种/付款/发票与本地规则一致
- 违约/赔偿/责任限制对齐
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/clause-consistency-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/gdpr-appi-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# GDPR/APPI Readiness Checklist

- 处理依据/同意与撤回
- 数据主体权利（访问/更正/删除/限制/可携）
- DPIA触发条件与流程
- 记录保存/留存周期/销毁证明
- 跨境/第三国传输机制
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/gdpr-appi-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/cross-border-transfer-checklist.md ====================
# Cross-border Transfer Checklist

- 目的地与数据类别/敏感度
- 法律依据与传输机制（示例：合同条款/充分性/例外）
- 风险评估与补救措施
- 供应商链条与再委托
- 持续监控与到期复核
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/cross-border-transfer-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/dpa-scc-checklist.md ====================
# DPA & SCC Checklist

- 角色界定（控制者/处理者/共同控制）
- 处理目的/范围/期限/地点
- 安全措施（技术/组织）
- 分包/再委托与通知
- 标准合同条款/附录映射
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/dpa-scc-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/subcontractor-risk-checklist.md ====================
# Subcontractor Risk Checklist

- 资质/合规证书与审计历史
- 安全/隐私条款与控制
- 财务健康/经营稳定性
- 交付SLA/违约记录
- 退出/数据返还/删除
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/subcontractor-risk-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/retention-and-deletion-checklist.md ====================
# Retention & Deletion Checklist

- 分类分级与留存期限矩阵
- 冻结（Legal Hold）与例外
- 定期清理/匿名化与证明
- 第三方留存/备份销毁
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/retention-and-deletion-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/training-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Training Compliance Checklist

- 强制课程分配/完成/考核
- 年度复训与题库抽检
- 员工入/离/调岗触发培训
- 记录/证据/抽样合规
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/training-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/timesheet-billing-terms-checklist.md ====================
# Timesheet & Billing Terms Checklist

- 工时/加班/夜班/差旅与SOW口径一致
- 客户对账/停表/例外记录
- 发票抬头/税号/账期与当地规则
- 争议处理/贷项/补开流程
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/timesheet-billing-terms-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/breach-response-drill-checklist.md ====================
# Breach Response Drill Checklist

- 分级与通知时限（内/外部）
- 证据保全/取证链
- 法规/合同要求差异化通报
- 事后RCA与改进行动
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/breach-response-drill-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/compliance-legal-kb.md ====================
# Compliance & Legal KB

- 生命周期：SOW→DPA→数据流/ROPA→DPIA→跨境→供应商→培训→事件→审计
- 文档到执行：模板→清单→任务→证据→仪表盘
- 口径：合同/隐私/安规/账单与本地法规一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/compliance-legal-kb.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/clause-library.md ====================
# Clause Library

- 关键条款样式：责任限制/赔偿/停表/价税/跨境/再委托/审计权/删除与返还
- 双方常见分歧点与折中方案备忘
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/clause-library.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/regulation-matrix.md ====================
# Regulation Matrix（示例结构）

- 维度：地域×数据类别×传输机制×保留期限×通报要求
- 维护：版本化/变更日志/审批记录
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/regulation-matrix.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/data-classification.md ====================
# Data Classification

- 分级：公开/内部/机密/高度机密
- PII/敏感PII/财务/健康/员工/客户数据举例与处理规则
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/data-classification.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/incident-taxonomy.md ====================
# Incident Taxonomy

- 类型：机密性/完整性/可用性事件、合法性与道德违规
- 分级：P1/P2/P3 与通知/取证要求
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/incident-taxonomy.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/risk-register.md ====================
# Risk Register

- 风险项：描述/原因/影响/可能性/等级/负责人/缓解/状态
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/risk-register.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/ingest-snapshot.md ====================
# Task: ingest-snapshot

- 输入：源系统名 + 时间窗
- 输出：快照落库与批次号
- 规则：幂等/重试/去重，记录源→目的映射
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/ingest-snapshot.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/run-dq.md ====================
# Task: run-dq

- 输入：dq-ruleset-tmpl.yaml
- 输出：规则通过率、异常清单、修复建议
- 规则：阻塞/警告分级与SLA
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/run-dq.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/build-mart.md ====================
# Task: build-mart

- 输入：pipeline-spec + 目标宽表名
- 输出：宽表/物化视图与血缘
- 规则：SCD/去重/时区统一
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/build-mart.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/reconcile-payroll.md ====================
# Task: reconcile-payroll

- 输入：Timesheet × Payroll × 规则
- 输出：差异对账与修复工单
- 规则：证据留痕与审批
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/reconcile-payroll.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/privacy-audit.md ====================
# Task: privacy-audit

- 输入：access matrix + 审批与日志
- 输出：隐私访问审计报告
- 规则：到期回收与再认证
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/privacy-audit.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/forecast-modeling.md ====================
# Task: forecast-modeling

- 输入：forecast spec + 训练数据
- 输出：预测结果与评估
- 规则：可解释性与漂移监控
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/forecast-modeling.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/data-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Data Contract", owner: hris-analytics }
entities:
  - name: Person
    keys: [person_id]
    fields: [name, email, phone, hire_date, status, region]
  - name: Job
    keys: [job_id]
    fields: [title, role_family, level, location, hiring_manager, status]
  - name: Application
    keys: [application_id]
    fields: [person_id, job_id, stage, source, created_at, updated_at]
  - name: Training
    keys: [training_id]
    fields: [title, category, mandatory, pass_threshold]
  - name: Enrollment
    keys: [enroll_id]
    fields: [person_id, training_id, start_at, complete_at, score]
  - name: Dispatch
    keys: [dispatch_id]
    fields: [person_id, client, role, site, start_at, end_at, sla]
  - name: Timesheet
    keys: [timesheet_id]
    fields: [person_id, date, shift, hours_regular, hours_ot, travel, approver]
  - name: Payroll
    keys: [pay_id]
    fields: [person_id, period, gross, allowance, overtime_pay, tax, currency]
measures: [utilization, coverage, nps, tth, oar, pass_rate, payroll_accuracy]
dimensions: [date, site, role, level, manager, client, region]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/data-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/schema-catalog-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Schema Catalog", owner: hris-analytics }
sources:
  - system: ATS
    tables: [jobs, candidates, applications, interviews]
  - system: HRIS
    tables: [employees, org, payroll]
  - system: LMS
    tables: [courses, enrollments, scores]
  - system: DISPATCH
    tables: [assignments, timesheets, invoices]
standards: [naming_conventions, data_types, timezone, pii_flags]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/schema-catalog-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/pipeline-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Pipeline Spec", owner: hris-analytics }
ingestion:
  mode: [full, incremental, cdc]
  schedule: [hourly, daily, weekly]
dq_hooks: [schema_check, null_check, pk_fk_check, range_check, enum_check, anomaly]
marts:
  - name: mart_recruiting_funnel
    grain: application_id
    dims: [job, date, source]
    facts: [stage, stage_dwell_days, conversion]
  - name: mart_training
    grain: enroll_id
    dims: [person, training, date]
    facts: [progress_pct, score, pass_flag]
  - name: mart_dispatch_util
    grain: person_id, date
    dims: [site, shift, client]
    facts: [hours_regular, hours_ot, utilization, coverage]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/pipeline-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dq-ruleset-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "DQ Ruleset", owner: hris-analytics }
rules:
  - id: pk_unique_person
    table: employees
    check: primary_key_unique(person_id)
  - id: email_format
    table: candidates
    check: regex(email, "^[^@\s]+@[^@\s]+\.[^@\s]+$")
  - id: timesheet_hours_range
    table: timesheets
    check: range(hours_regular+hours_ot, 0, 24)
  - id: enum_stage
    table: applications
    check: enum(stage, ["Sourced","Screen","Interview","Offer","Hired","Reject"])
  - id: payroll_currency
    table: payroll
    check: enum(currency, ["JPY","USD","EUR","CNY"])
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dq-ruleset-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/privacy-access-audit-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Privacy Access Audit", owner: hris-analytics }
sections:
  - { id: domains, title: 数据分域与角色, fields: [domain, role, privileges] }
  - { id: review, title: 审批与访问留痕, fields: [requester, approver, period, logs] }
  - { id: recert, title: 权限再认证, fields: [scope, due, status] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/privacy-access-audit-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/model-forecast-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Forecast Spec", owner: hris-analytics }
targets: [coverage_rate, utilization, attrition_rate]
features: [seasonality, holidays, backlog, hiring_pipeline, training_progress]
evaluation: [mape, mae, bias, stability]
monitoring: [drift, freshness, alert_thresholds]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/model-forecast-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/recruiting-funnel-tmpl.yaml ====================

sections:
  - { id: overview, title: 摘要, fields: [period, roles, sources] }
  - { id: stages, title: 漏斗阶段, fields: [applied, screened, interviewed, offered, hired] }
  - { id: metrics, title: 指标, fields: [tth, oar, stage_conversion, bottlenecks] }

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/training-effectiveness-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Training Effectiveness Report", owner: hris-analytics }

  - { id: coverage, title: 覆盖与完成, fields: [assigned, completed, completion_rate] }
  - { id: outcomes, title: 成效, fields: [post_test_uplift, on_job_metrics, feedback] }
  - { id: actions, title: 改进行动, fields: [owner, due, status] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/training-effectiveness-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dispatch-utilization-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Dispatch Utilization Report", owner: hris-analytics }
sections:
  - { id: snapshot, title: 周视图, fields: [coverage, utilization, overtime] }
  - { id: risks, title: 风险, fields: [no_show, backlog, hotspots] }
  - { id: improvements, title: 改进, fields: [actions, owners, eta] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dispatch-utilization-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/payroll-recon-report-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Payroll Reconciliation Report", owner: hris-analytics }
sections:
  - { id: scope, title: 范围, fields: [period, sources, rules] }
  - { id: diffs, title: 差异, fields: [timesheet_vs_payroll, tax_currency, exceptions] }
  - { id: resolution, title: 纠正, fields: [owner, due, evidence] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/payroll-recon-report-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/data-access-matrix-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Data Access Matrix", owner: hris-analytics }
columns: [role, dataset, permission, expiry, approver, evidence]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/data-access-matrix-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/pii-register-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "PII Register", owner: hris-analytics }
columns: [field, system, pii_level, masking_strategy, retention, owner]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/pii-register-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/event-tracking-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Event Tracking Spec", owner: hris-analytics }
events:
  - name: application_created
    fields: [application_id, job_id, person_id, source, ts]
  - name: interview_completed
    fields: [application_id, result, score, interviewer, ts]
  - name: training_completed
    fields: [enroll_id, score, pass_flag, ts]
  - name: dispatch_started
    fields: [dispatch_id, person_id, site, ts]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/event-tracking-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/glossary-tmpl.md ====================
## 口径与术语

- Time to Hire (TTH)：从申请到发放 Offer 的中位天数
- Offer Accept Rate (OAR)：Offer 被接受的比例
- Utilization：计费/有效工时 ÷ 可用工时
- Coverage：已排班/到岗人数 ÷ 需求人数
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/glossary-tmpl.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/hris-analytics-master-checklist.md ====================
# hris-analytics-master-checklist.md

- 数据契约与口径统一（实体/字段/度量/维度）
- 源系统接入与同步策略（全量/增量/变更数据捕获）
- 数据质量：完整性/唯一性/一致性/及时性/准确性
- 隐私与访问控制：最小权限/脱敏/到期回收
- 模型与宽表：星型/雪花/拉链表（SCD）策略
- 指标字典与报表对齐（SLA/阈值/例外）
- 对账：工时→薪酬/发票；派遣→账单口径
- 审计证据：日志/样本/截图/批次号
- 备份与DR：RPO/RTO 与演练
- 监控与告警：新鲜度/延迟/失败率
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/hris-analytics-master-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/data-quality-checklist.md ====================
# data-quality-checklist.md

- 完整性（not null、覆盖率）与唯一性（主键/组合键）
- 参照完整性（外键）与业务约束（状态机合法性）
- 值域/正则/枚举校验与异常点规则
- 重复与冲突（候选人/岗位/公司）
- 时间一致性（时区/生效区间/闭区间）
- DQ 报告：规则通过率、问题 TopN、修复 SLA
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/data-quality-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/privacy-access-control-checklist.md ====================
# privacy-access-control-checklist.md

- 数据分域（HR/客户/财务/安全）与 RBAC/ABAC
- PII/SPII 分类与最小权限
- 数据脱敏（静态/动态）与 Tokenization
- 审批与访问留痕；到期自动回收
- 第三方共享与越境传输台账
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/privacy-access-control-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/pii-masking-checklist.md ====================
# pii-masking-checklist.md

- 字段级脱敏策略（姓名/联系方式/地址/证件）
- 部分可逆（Token）与不可逆（Hash）选择
- 报表视图按角色差异化展示
- 漏洞/旁路导出管控与水印策略
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/pii-masking-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/integration-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# integration-readiness-checklist.md

- 源系统列表/接口/频率/限流/重试/幂等
- CDC/增量游标与回补策略
- 沙箱与联调/回归测试
- 变更管理与版本化
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/integration-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/payroll-timesheet-reconciliation-checklist.md ====================
# payroll-timesheet-reconciliation-checklist.md

- 工时/班次/津贴/差旅口径与薪酬一致
- 客户停表/例外与发票口径
- 税率与币种处理
- 对账差异与纠正流程
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/payroll-timesheet-reconciliation-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/reporting-accuracy-checklist.md ====================
# reporting-accuracy-checklist.md

- 指标定义与公式口径一致
- 维度下钻/汇总一致（汇总容差）
- 报表样例对比与用户验收
- 发布/变更留痕
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/reporting-accuracy-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/model-validation-checklist.md ====================
# model-validation-checklist.md

- 训练/验证/测试切分与时间泄露检查
- 基线/对照组/增益评估
- 稳定性与漂移监控
- 可解释性/敏感度/偏差审计
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/model-validation-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/audit-evidence-checklist.md ====================
# audit-evidence-checklist.md

- 数据来源/批次/快照与校验记录
- DQ 报告与修复记录
- 访问/审批日志与权限变更
- 抽样与截屏证据
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/audit-evidence-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/backup-and-dr-drill-checklist.md ====================
# backup-and-dr-drill-checklist.md

- 备份频率与加密
- RPO/RTO 目标与演练记录
- 恢复步骤与演练结果
- 关键报表/仓库的切换预案
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/backup-and-dr-drill-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/metrics-dictionary.md ====================
# metrics-dictionary.md

- Freshness_SLA：按数据集与日/周刷新目标计算
- DQ_Pass_Rate：通过的规则 ÷ 总规则
- TimeToHire：申请→Offer 的中位/平均天数
- Offer_Accept_Rate：接受 Offer ÷ Offer 发出
- Utilization/Coverage/Overtime/No-Show：派遣口径
- Payroll_Accuracy：对账通过数量 ÷ 总对账项
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/metrics-dictionary.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/entity-relationship.md ====================
# entity-relationship.md

- 关键实体：Person/Job/Application/Interview/Training/Enrollment/Dispatch/Timesheet/Payroll
- 关系：Person↔Application↔Job、Person↔Enrollment↔Training、Person↔Dispatch↔Timesheet↔Payroll
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/entity-relationship.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/scd-policy.md ====================
# scd-policy.md

- SCD2 拉链：员工/岗位/组织等缓慢变化维度
- 变更捕获：有效期（start_at/end_at）与快照日（as_of）
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/scd-policy.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/data-freshness-sla.md ====================
# data-freshness-sla.md

- 招聘/ATS：小时级；HRIS/Payroll：日级；LMS/Dispatch：日/周级（示例）
- 告警阈值：warn=目标-10%，crit=目标-20%
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/data-freshness-sla.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/codebook.md ====================
# codebook.md

- 字段命名/数据类型/单位/时区/缺失值规范
- 布尔/枚举/状态机定义与停表边界
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/codebook.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/calendars-and-dimensions.md ====================
# calendars-and-dimensions.md

- Date/Week/Quarter/Region/Site/Shift 维表说明
- 假日表与跨时区规则
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/calendars-and-dimensions.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/run-payroll.md ====================
# Task: run-payroll

- 输入：period + locks + rates/rules + approvals
- 输出：payslips + payroll_journal + evidence
- 规则：抽样复核/留痕/回滚预案
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/run-payroll.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/reconcile-timesheets.md ====================
# Task: reconcile-timesheets

- 输入：Timesheets × Payroll × 规则
- 输出：差异清单/修复工单/复核结果
- 规则：异常分级与SLA闭环
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/reconcile-timesheets.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/process-expenses.md ====================
# Task: process-expenses

- 输入：expense reports + policy
- 输出：合规判定/入账/支付批次
- 规则：重复/超标/税率校验
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/process-expenses.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/generate-invoices.md ====================
# Task: generate-invoices

- 输入：billing schedule + 数据源
- 输出：发票/红字/贷项 + 台账
- 规则：价税/抬头/停表边界一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/generate-invoices.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/ar-ap-aging.md ====================
# Task: ar-ap-aging

- 输入：AR/AP 明细 + 条款/账期
- 输出：账龄表与催收/付款计划
- 规则：风险客户与坏账计提
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/ar-ap-aging.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/tax-compliance.md ====================
# Task: tax-compliance

- 输入：税务日历 + 票据/申报数据
- 输出：申报回执 + 差异清单
- 规则：阈值/例外与取证链
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/tax-compliance.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/fx-revalue.md ====================
# Task: fx-revalue

- 输入：期末汇率表 + 多币种余额
- 输出：重估损益分录与报表
- 规则：来源/时点/汇差口径一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/fx-revalue.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/close-month.md ====================
# Task: close-month

- 输入：截止/未达账/应计/重估/收入确认
- 输出：月结分录与报表包
- 规则：四眼/抽样/签批与锁账
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/close-month.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/payroll-runbook-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta:
  {
    name: "Payroll Runbook",
    owner: finance-payroll,
    editors: [hris-analytics, staffing-dispatch-coordinator],
  }
steps:
  [
    lock_timesheets,
    import_approved_hours,
    apply_rates_rules,
    tax_social_calc,
    benefits_deduction,
    review_samples,
    approvals,
    generate_payslips,
    disbursement,
    archive_evidence,
  ]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/payroll-runbook-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/payroll-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Payroll Compliance Checklist

- 薪酬口径：基本/加班/夜班/津贴/差旅与SOW一致
- 工时来源/审批/停表与例外处理一致
- 个税/社保/福利扣缴规则与地域法规一致
- 薪资单据与发放渠道安全/隐私达标
- 跑批复核/抽样/签批留痕
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/payroll-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/timesheet-integrity-checklist.md ====================
# Timesheet Integrity Checklist

- 工时填报频率/截止时间/审批链完整
- 异常工时（>12h、跨日、漏打卡）处理
- 班次/地点/项目与薪酬要素一致
- 留痕：原始记录、修改轨迹、审批证据
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/timesheet-integrity-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/expense-policy-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Expense Policy Compliance Checklist

- 报销范围/上限/币种/税率/发票规则
- 发票/收据真伪与重复报销识别
- 超标/例外审批记录
- 费用入账维度（项目/客户/成本中心）
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/expense-policy-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/tax-vat-gst-checklist.md ====================
# Tax / VAT / GST Checklist

- 适用税种/税率矩阵与证据
- 免税/零税/反向计税场景
- 申报日历/材料/报表/回执
- 进项/销项与开票口径一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/tax-vat-gst-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/invoice-dispute-resolution-checklist.md ====================
# Invoice Dispute Resolution Checklist

- 争议类型/金额/原因与证据
- 纠正发票/红字与贷项流程
- 时限与客户沟通留痕
- 复发预防与条款回补
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/invoice-dispute-resolution-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/month-close-checklist.md ====================
# Month Close Checklist

- 截止/截账与未达账处理
- 应计/摊销/预提/结转分录
- 银行/往来/外币重估对账
- 报表包（P&L/BS/CF）与签批
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/month-close-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/revenue-recognition-checklist.md ====================
# Revenue Recognition Checklist

- 收入确认原则（IFRS/US GAAP/本地）
- 里程碑/工时/订阅/固定价口径
- 递延收入/合同负债处理
- 证据与客户验收/停表一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/revenue-recognition-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/ar-ap-aging-checklist.md ====================
# AR/AP Aging Checklist

- 账龄区间/余额/逾期原因
- 催收策略/折扣/坏账准备
- 供应商/付款周期/折扣策略
- 风险客户与信用额度
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/ar-ap-aging-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/audit-prep-checklist.md ====================
# Audit Prep Checklist

- 取样清单/凭证/合同/SOW/发票/回单
- 分录抽查与凭证链
- 访问/权限/分工制衡证据
- 审计发现整改项与SLA
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/audit-prep-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/finance-privacy-access-checklist.md ====================
# Finance Privacy & Access Checklist

- 薪资/身份证件/银行信息分域与脱敏
- RBAC/ABAC 权限与到期回收
- 数据导出水印/访问留痕
- 第三方共享/越境传输台账
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/finance-privacy-access-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/finance-kb.md ====================
# Finance KB

- 生命周期：薪酬→计费→税务→月结→报表→审计
- 文档到执行：模板→清单→任务→证据→仪表盘
- 与 HR/法务/客户 的口径与条款一致性
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/finance-kb.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/chart-of-accounts.md ====================
# Chart of Accounts (示例)

- 薪酬相关：工资、加班费、福利、社保、公积金、个人所得税
- 收入/成本：服务收入、递延收入、成本、差旅、办公
- 资产/负债：应收、应付、银行存款、预提、合同负债、汇兑损益
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/chart-of-accounts.md ====================

- 地域×税种×税率×凭证要求×申报频率（示例占位）
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/tax-rate-matrix.md ====================

- 币种/精度/展示规则/默认汇率来源与时点（示例占位）
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/currency-table.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/intake-and-triage.md ====================
# Task: intake-and-triage

- 输入：er-case-intake + triage-matrix
- 输出：分级/路由与SLA时钟
- 规则：最小知情、利益冲突回避
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/intake-and-triage.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/investigate-case.md ====================
# Task: investigate-case

- 输入：investigation plan + 证据
- 输出：调查报告/结论与建议
- 规则：一致性问题集/证据链/法律评审
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/investigate-case.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/mediate-conflict.md ====================
# Task: mediate-conflict

- 输入：mediation plan
- 输出：调解记录与协议
- 规则：中立/自愿/可执行性
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/mediate-conflict.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/disciplinary-procedure.md ====================
# Task: disciplinary-procedure

- 输入：调查结论 + 政策
- 输出：处分决定/文书/申诉路径
- 规则：比例性/一致性/可追溯
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/disciplinary-procedure.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/pip-coaching.md ====================
# Task: pip-coaching

- 输入：pip plan + 里程碑
- 输出：辅导记录/评估/结论
- 规则：目标清晰/评估客观
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/pip-coaching.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/accommodation-review.md ====================
# Task: accommodation-review

- 输入：申请 + 医学/合理性证据
- 输出：批准/替代方案/到期复核
- 规则：安全边界/公平性
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/accommodation-review.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/leave-management.md ====================
# Task: leave-management

- 输入：请假资料与资格
- 输出：批准/影响评估/到期提醒
- 规则：法规与SOW口径一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/leave-management.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/return-to-work.md ====================
# Task: return-to-work

- 输入：rtw plan + 医学证明
- 输出：复工安排/限制/跟踪
- 规则：岗位保护/渐进复工

- 输出：周报/热点/升级工单
- 规则：保密与取证链

meta: { name: "ER Triage Matrix", owner: employee-relations-support }
axes:
  [
    severity(P1..P3),
    urgency(U1..U3),
    compliance_trigger(harassment|retaliation|discrimination|safety|other),
  ]
routing: [investigation, mediation, coaching, legal, security, wellbeing]

meta: { name: "Return to Work Plan", owner: employee-relations-support }
fields: [restrictions, transitional_tasks, schedule, supervisor, checkpoints, clearance]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/rtw-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

meta: { name: "Grievance Report", owner: employee-relations-support }
sections: [summary, timeline, findings, decision, remedies, communication_record]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/grievance-report-tmpl.yaml ====================

meta: { name: "Exit Interview", owner: employee-relations-support }
fields: [reason_codes, manager_effectiveness, culture, pay_benefits, rehire, comments]

meta: { name: "Pulse Survey", owner: employee-relations-support }

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/weekly-er-brief-tmpl.md ====================
## 上周案件/热点/风险

## 调查/调解/处分进展

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/hotline-log-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/hotline-log-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/er-master-checklist.md ====================
# ER Master Checklist

- 受理：来源/时间/涉事人/保密分级/利益冲突筛查
- 分级：严重度/紧急度/合规触发（骚扰/报复/歧视/安全）
- 通知：当事人/见证人/经理/合规/法务（最小知情原则）
- 调查：计划/访谈/证据保全/时间线
- 调解或处分：方案/知情同意/执行与监督
- PIP/辅导：目标/里程碑/证据/复盘
- 休假/便利：依据/医学/法定/证明/到期复核
- 复工：工作限制/过渡安排/跟踪点
- 留痕与审计：台账/审批/文件密级/留存周期
- 指标与复盘：KPI与改进项
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/er-master-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/fair-investigation-checklist.md ====================
# Fair Investigation Checklist

- 中立性与回避机制
- 访谈提纲/一致性问题/翻译与无障碍
- 证据：原始记录/数字取证/截图/日志
- 双方陈述与佐证，纠偏与补充
- 结论标准与建议书结构
- 数据保密与法律风险评估
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/fair-investigation-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/mediation-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# Mediation Readiness Checklist

- 双方调解意愿与受损评估
- 权利义务与红线明确
- 时间/地点/安全与隐私保障
- 调解规则与记录方式
- 失败退出与升级路径
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/mediation-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/disciplinary-due-process-checklist.md ====================
# Disciplinary Due Process Checklist

- 事实清单与证据权重
- 处分阶梯与一致性（口头→书面→停职/解聘）
- 申诉与复核渠道
- 合同/政策引用与告知
- 时间线/留痕/签收
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/disciplinary-due-process-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/leave-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Leave Compliance Checklist

- 假勤类型/资格/证明
- 病假/产假/护理假/工伤/带薪与无薪
- 跨地域与派遣现场差异
- 薪酬/福利/年资影响
- 假满回归与岗位保护
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/leave-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/accommodation-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Accommodation Compliance Checklist

- 触发条件/资格/医学/合理性评估
- 可行替代/成本与影响
- 安全与绩效边界
- 审批/期限/复核
- 文档化与保密
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/accommodation-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/anti-harassment-compliance-checklist.md ====================
# Anti-harassment Compliance Checklist

- 定义/范围/举证标准
- 预防培训/签收/抽检
- 举报渠道与保护
- 调查SLA与通报
- 纠正与跟踪
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/anti-harassment-compliance-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/anti-retaliation-checklist.md ====================
# Anti-retaliation Checklist

- 报复定义/类型/监控信号
- 人群与时窗（举报后180天等示例）
- 指标：岗位变化/评分/排班/收入
- 抽样访谈与热线监控
- 纠正与问责
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/anti-retaliation-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/wellbeing-stress-safety-checklist.md ====================
# Wellbeing / Stress / Safety Checklist

- 压力/工时/夜班/差旅风险扫描
- 心理支持渠道/危机升级矩阵
- 现场安全与安保联动
- 高风险岗位轮换与休整
- 复盘与预防
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/wellbeing-stress-safety-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/er-privacy-access-checklist.md ====================
# ER Privacy & Access Checklist

- 数据分域/密级/最小权限
- 访谈记录/证据的访问留痕
- 到期回收/导出水印
- 第三方披露与跨境台账
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/checklists/er-privacy-access-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/er-kb.md ====================
# ER KB

- 生命周期：受理→分级→调查/调解/处分→便利/休假→复工→复盘
- 文档到执行：模板→清单→任务→证据→仪表盘
- 协同：与 HRIS/Compliance/Onboarding/派遣现场/SM 的口径一致
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/er-kb.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/policy-library.md ====================
# Policy Library

- 反骚扰/反报复/行为准则/申诉处理/合理便利/休假与考勤/绩效与PIP/保密与数据保护 等政策要点与版本记录
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/policy-library.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/labor-law-matrix.md ====================
# Labor Law Matrix（示例结构）

- 地域×议题（申诉/休复工/便利/安全/隐私）× 法规要点 × 证据要求 × 时效/时限
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/labor-law-matrix.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/grievance-taxonomy.md ====================
# Grievance Taxonomy

- 分类：管理方式/沟通/薪酬与排班/歧视骚扰/安全/隐私/报复/其他
- 严重度：P1/P2/P3 与示例
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/grievance-taxonomy.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/escalation-matrix.md ====================
# Escalation Matrix

- 场景×升级路径（HRBP/合规/法务/安全/IT/高管）× 联系人 × 响应SLA
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/data/escalation-matrix.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/data-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Data Contract", owner: hris-analytics }
entities:
  - name: Person
    keys: [person_id]
    fields: [name, email, phone, hire_date, status, region]
  - name: Job
    keys: [job_id]
    fields: [title, role_family, level, location, hiring_manager, status]
  - name: Application
    keys: [application_id]
    fields: [person_id, job_id, stage, source, created_at, updated_at]
  - name: Training
    keys: [training_id]
    fields: [title, category, mandatory, pass_threshold]
  - name: Enrollment
    keys: [enroll_id]
    fields: [person_id, training_id, start_at, complete_at, score]
  - name: Dispatch
    keys: [dispatch_id]
    fields: [person_id, client, role, site, start_at, end_at, sla]
  - name: Timesheet
    keys: [timesheet_id]
    fields: [person_id, date, shift, hours_regular, hours_ot, travel, approver]
  - name: Payroll
    keys: [pay_id]
    fields: [person_id, period, gross, allowance, overtime_pay, tax, currency]
measures: [utilization, coverage, nps, tth, oar, pass_rate, payroll_accuracy]
dimensions: [date, site, role, level, manager, client, region]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/data-contract-tmpl.yaml ====================

edges: [collection, transfer, process, share, store]
fields: [purpose, lawful_basis, retention, owner, evidence]

  - { id: security, title: 安全措施, fields: [technical_measures, org_measures] }
  - { id: subprocessors, title: 分包与再委托, fields: [approval, list, notice_period] }

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dq-ruleset-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "DQ Ruleset", owner: hris-analytics }
rules:
  - id: pk_unique_person
    table: employees
    check: primary_key_unique(person_id)
  - id: email_format
    table: candidates
    check: regex(email, "^[^@\s]+@[^@\s]+\.[^@\s]+$")
  - id: timesheet_hours_range
    table: timesheets
    check: range(hours_regular+hours_ot, 0, 24)
  - id: enum_stage
    table: applications
    check: enum(stage, ["Sourced","Screen","Interview","Offer","Hired","Reject"])
  - id: payroll_currency
    table: payroll
    check: enum(currency, ["JPY","USD","EUR","CNY"])
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/dq-ruleset-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/engagement-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Engagement Plan", owner: client-engagement-manager }
sections:
  - { id: objectives, title: 目标与成功标准, fields: [objectives, success_criteria] }
  - { id: delivery, title: 交付节奏, fields: [cadence, milestones, owners] }
  - { id: risks, title: 风险与缓解, fields: [risk_register_ref, mitigations, contingency] }
  - { id: governance, title: 治理与升级, fields: [escalation_matrix_ref, decision_rights] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/engagement-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/er-case-intake-tmpl.yaml ====================

  ]

  - { severity: P1, response_sla: "15m", notify: [client-exec, vendor-exec], bridge: yes }
  - { severity: P2, response_sla: "1h", notify: [client-manager, vendor-manager], bridge: yes }
  - { severity: P3, response_sla: "4h", notify: [project-team], bridge: no }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/escalation-matrix-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/glossary-tmpl.md ====================
## 口径与术语

- Time to Hire (TTH)：从申请到发放 Offer 的中位天数
- Offer Accept Rate (OAR)：Offer 被接受的比例
- Utilization：计费/有效工时 ÷ 可用工时
- Coverage：已排班/到岗人数 ÷ 需求人数
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/glossary-tmpl.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/pipeline-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Pipeline Spec", owner: hris-analytics }
ingestion:
  mode: [full, incremental, cdc]
  schedule: [hourly, daily, weekly]
dq_hooks: [schema_check, null_check, pk_fk_check, range_check, enum_check, anomaly]
marts:
  - name: mart_recruiting_funnel
    grain: application_id
    dims: [job, date, source]
    facts: [stage, stage_dwell_days, conversion]
  - name: mart_training
    grain: enroll_id
    dims: [person, training, date]
    facts: [progress_pct, score, pass_flag]
  - name: mart_dispatch_util
    grain: person_id, date
    dims: [site, shift, client]
    facts: [hours_regular, hours_ot, utilization, coverage]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/pipeline-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/weekly-er-brief-tmpl.md ====================

## 热线与脉搏调查信号

## 行动项与责任人
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/weekly-er-brief-tmpl.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/weekly-status-report-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "Weekly Status Report", owner: client-engagement-manager }
sections:
  - { id: highlights, title: 本周亮点, fields: [wins, kpi_trend, blockers_resolved] }
  - { id: risks, title: 风险与阻塞, fields: [new_risks, blocks, sla_breaches] }
  - { id: actions, title: 行动项, fields: [owner, due, status] }
  - { id: asks, title: 需要支持, fields: [decision_needed, escalation] }
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/weekly-status-report-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/what-if-scenario-tmpl.yaml ====================
meta: { name: "What-If Scenario", owner: staffing-dispatch-coordinator }
assumptions:
  - { id: demand_spike, title: 需求+15%, params: [site:A, shift:N] }
  - { id: staff_dropout, title: 缺勤+3%, params: [role:senior, reason:flu] }
  - { id: holiday_overlap, title: 假日叠加, params: [region:JP, week:W52] }
outputs: [coverage_impact, overtime_impact, arrival_sla_risk, cost_delta]
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/templates/what-if-scenario-tmpl.yaml ====================

- 输出：快照落库与批次号
- 规则：幂等/重试/去重，记录源→目的映射
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/ingest-snapshot.md ====================

# Task: review-brand-operations

## Steps

选择域→加载文档与样例→按清单逐项评估→输出差距与优先级。

## Outputs

- 审阅报告 + 改进清单（RACI/里程碑）
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-brand-operations.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-curriculum-ops.md ====================
# Task: review-curriculum-ops

## Purpose

分域审阅（目标/蓝图/故事板/内容/评估/无障碍/本地化/打包/集成）。

## Steps

## Outputs

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-operations.md ====================
# Task: review-operations

## Purpose

分域审阅 HR 运营：Recruiting / L&D / Dispatch / Payroll / Compliance。

## Steps

1. 选择域与范围。
2. 读取对应文档与数据样例。
3. 按域清单（见 checklists/\*）逐项审阅。
4. 出具差距报告与优先级。

## Outputs

- 审阅报告与改进清单（含 RACI 与里程碑）。
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/review-operations.md ====================

==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/session-plan.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-scenarios.md ====================
# Task: simulate-scenarios

- 输入：需求信号（客户/站点/岗位/班次）、供给池（技能/等级/可用性）、约束（工时/加班/证照）、SLA/成本阈值
- 输出：覆盖率、利用率、成本、OT、风险热力图；推荐方案与变更单
- 方法：Baseline/Optimistic/Pessimistic/Surge；蒙特卡洛；线性/整数规划（可选）
- 验收：Coverage ≥ 95% 且 Cost ≤ 预算 或签批例外；生成证据与版本号
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-scenarios.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-what-if.md ====================
# Task: simulate-what-if

- 输入：what-if-scenario-tmpl.yaml + 约束
- 输出：覆盖率/加班/到岗SLA/成本影响
- 规则：显式假设、敏感度分析
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/simulate-what-if.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/validate-operations.md ====================
# Task: validate-operations

## Purpose

统一评分与验收，形成端到端健康度视图。

## Steps

1. 聚合各域清单执行结果。
2. 计算权重分与总分；标注必过项状态。
3. 输出热力图与优先级整改计划。

## Outputs

- 健康度评分卡与验收意见。

## Acceptance Criteria

- 总分≥85 且必过项通过方可进入生产。
==================== END: .bmad-staffing-hr-expansion-pack/tasks/validate-operations.md ====================
